mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE (STORE_NUM, id, classify, name, address, phone, menu, time, reserving, etc, pwd, count, picture, CITYCODE, DISTRICTCODE) VALUES (STORE_SEQ.nextval, 'deliciousman', #{classify}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{menu}, #{time},#{reserving},#{etc},#{pwd}, 0, #{picture}, #{citycode}, #{districtcode})
mapper.delete: delete from STORE where STORE_NUM = #{storeNum} and PWD = #{pwd}
mapper.select: select CLASSIFY from STORE where STORE_NUM=#{storeNum}
SELECT * FROM STORE WHERE ID=${ID} ORDER BY STORE_NUM
